column4: The price applies when the same person goes to several sessions
---Members get a discount if you pay in advance at the latest {0}.
The fee will then be: {0}, {1}, {2}, {3}, {4} resp. {5} SEK
Contact Arne (see below) for advance payments
In case of cancellation before {0}, the entire fee will be refunded.
Young people pay half the price.

column2: We use Leif Håkanssons single rotationsprogram at all levels!
